```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```


## Histogram of air time of all flights

```{r}
flights %>% 
  filter(...) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = ...))
```


```{r}
flights %>% 
  filter(...) %>% 
  filter(...) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = ...))
```

## All very close relations

```{r}
flights %>%
  filter() %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bin2d(aes(..., ...))
```
